Meta.title: Eros, ananke, play (it ain39t all bad)
Meta.body:
In addressing the purpose of life, Sigmund Freud famously said "Work and love, love and work - that's all there is." With all respect to Freud, I disagree. He left out play.1

Love and nessesity.

“Two-fold foundation of society: the compulsion to work, which was created by external necessity, and the power of love...” 'Civilization and Its Discontents' (1930) (S.E. XXI.101)
